Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Detroit in 2012...
Injured on 5/2/2013 with a Sprained Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/29/2014 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/2016 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 8 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/14/2017, off Matt Harvey (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/1/2017, off Ben Sheets (SEA)...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Oakland on 9/27/2017...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/11/2018, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/18/2018 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston on 9/12/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/16/2019, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 9/29/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .450 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2019...
Injured on 5/16/2020 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/2020 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2021, hitting .324 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 6/16/2022...
Injured on 6/17/2022 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2022...
Injured on 6/8/2023 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
